alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Marion (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:53PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Marion and northwestern Baxter Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 552 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ozark Isle, or near Bull Shoals, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain Home... Bull Shoals... Gassville... Flippin... Lakeview in Baxter County... Arkawana... Price Place... Ozark Regional Airport... Ozark Isle... Fawn Park... Lakeway... Bull Shoals State Park... Colfax... Cotter... Midway in Baxter County... Fairview in Marion County... Clarkridge... Monarch... Oakland... Peel... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Bull Shoals Lake, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
